=Retrieve=

The "Retrieve" command will return various information about files and folders from the operating system.  For specifics, see the following:
 * [retrieveDir Retrieve,Dir] - Display a dialog box asking the user to select a folder	 
 * [retrieveFile Retrieve,File] - Display a dialog box asking the user to select a fil[ename	 
 * [retrieveFileSize Retrieve,FileSize] - Calculate the size of a file 
 * [retrieveFileVersion Retrieve,FileVersion] - Retrieves version info from a specified file
 * [retrieveFolderSize Retrieve,FolderSize] 	Calculate the size of a folder
 * [retrieveMD5 Retrieve,MD5] - Calculate the MD5 hash of a particular file
